channel.title: Socket forward over tty
channel.description:
Hello,
Do you know if they are a simple way to bridge a physical serial port with a TCP or UDP socket? Thx for your feedback
Best regards
François

item.title: Socket forward over tty
item.dc:creator: dfrey
item.description:
I found a StackOverflow post that describes exposing a UART over TCP using socat. socat isn’t part of the Linux image that is shipped with WP modules, but I think it could be enabled in the Yocto build based on this recipe listing for socat.

Read full topic
